title: #269 - LeeAnn Kreischer & ME
description:
My wife LeeAnn and I sit down in the man cave and talk about the Aziz scandal, The me too movement, and Ari Shaffir getting kicked off twitter. 

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. To get $30 off your first order with free shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 


This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast
